"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5487c0d963687214c65d0100#post_5487c0d963687214c65d0100
Well she is a Gumiho after all.

Her original skin:
!http://static.giantbomb.com/uploads/scale_small/0/8272/2098243-103.jpg!
Dynasty ahri:
!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20120124011052/leagueoflegends/images/thumb/8/89/Ahri_DynastySkin_Ch.jpg/613x460x2-Ahri_DynastySkin_Ch.png!
Midnight ahri:
!http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121128190021/leagueoflegends/images/thumb/2/22/Ahri_MidnightSkin_Ch.jpg/613x460x2-Ahri_MidnightSkin_Ch.png!
Foxfire ahri:
!http://img2.leaguecraft.com/lol-splash-art/asset/wallpaper_760px_42.jpg!
Popstar ahri:
!http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/pahri-articlebanner_1.jpg?itok=4M4wtaDc!

If they got rid of those goofy spikes on her new skin and turned it into just a skintight leather costume I'd totally be down for it, but those spikes, helmet and such are beyond goofy.
